SMITHSONIAN MISCELLANEOUS COLLECTIONS 
 PART OF VOL. XLIX 

Samuel Pierpont Langley 

Secretary of the Smithsonian Institution, 1887-1906 

MEMORIAL MEETING 

December 3, 1906 

ADDRESSES BY 
 DOCTOR WHITE, PROFESSOR PICKERING, AND MR. CHANUTE 

(No. 1720) 

CITY OF WASHINGTON 
 PUBLISHED BY THE SMITHSONIAN INSTITUTION 

1907
